meanings: perfume, (향기) scent, fragrance, (formal) redolence, (커피 등의) aroma, (와인 등의) bouquet
intention, inclination, thought, 향의하다 intend to, be inclined to, have a mind to (do)
a guide, a fugleman(군대의), guidance, conduct, leading, leadership, 향도하다 guide, conduct, lead, fugle
